data.name: Critical Gravity Alpha Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo contains the first three tracks, EASY mode, HARD mode and Multiplayer online.
data.about_the_game: The demo contains the first three tracks, EASY mode, HARD mode and Multiplayer online.
data.short_description: Pipe Racing with Physics. Easy mode ensures gravity is towards the pipe track. Hard mode uses regular gravity which means the driver can fly off the track (for better or worse). Hard mode is the intended game but suit yourself.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer.
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: i7 or greater
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
